presenter module¶

A Presenter module for bookmarks manager program within MVP pattern. Contains a class Presenter and the main() routine. Uses interface approach for isolation of the Presenter business logic from View and Model parts of the pattern. Creates, opens and converts bookmark files of internet browsers to the internal structure. Allows to add, delete, and modify bookmark nodes, which are folders and URLs.

class presenter.Presenter¶

Bases: object

A class that contains the main logic of the bookmark manager.

Param:

No Parameters

add_bookmark() → bool¶

Add a new node to the current tree, folder of url. Request a name for a new bookmark (alphabetic and numeric characters, additional characters from VALID_CHARS only). Duplicate names will be rejected. Request the name of the parent folder to add the bookmark and check if it exists. Request of type of the new bookmark: folder or url. Get the values for the url type bookmark fields.

Returns:

True for success otherwise False

convert_from() → bool¶

Convert external bookmark database to the internal format. Request a name of the external source file, check if it exists. Request a filename of the new internal bookmark structure and create it. Request a format of the external source and convert this file.

Returns:

True for success otherwise False

create_tree() → bool¶

Create a new bookmark’s structure. Request a filename for the new structure (alphabetic and numeric characters, additional characters from VALID_CHARS only) and open a file for the new bookmark set. If the file already exists, request to overwrite this file.

Returns:

True for success otherwise False

delete_bookmark() → bool¶

Delete the node of the current tree, folder or url. Request the name of the node to delete, check if it exist. Node <roots> can not be deleted. Non-empty folder can not be deleted.

Returns:

True for success otherwise False

execute_request(menu_item: MenuItem)¶

Call the instance method from the current menu

static exit_of_loop() → tuple[bool, str]¶

Exit from the executive menu, empty argument for compatibility

Returns:

False, epmty string, for compatibility

get_request(menu_items: tuple[common.MenuItem, ...]) → MenuItem | None¶

Get a user request from menu options. Menu is a tuple.

modify_bookmark() → bool¶

Modify the fields of the existing tree node, folder or url. Select a node, then select a field of node to modify. Return when the field was modified or selection was broken by user. Editable fields for url are contained in URL_FIELDS, for folders - in FOLDER_FIELDS.

Returns:

True for success otherwise False

open_tree() → bool¶

Open an existing bookmark structure from a file.

Returns:

True for success otherwise False

print_tree() → bool¶

Print the names of all the bookmark nodes of the current tree. Use recursive inner function _output_loop().

Returns:

True for success otherwise False

presenter.main()¶

Main routine of the bookmark manager. Create an instance of the class Presenter. An infinite loop of the main menu until the EOF and RETURN or <Exit> commands are executed.

Returns:

no

Bookmark manager (a learning project)
